title: skript放置萝卜、土豆作物方块的英文？？
author: 子德
txt_content:
RT
set block to 什么？？？
我要萝卜和土豆幼苗方块英文
skript可以识别的。

replies.txt_content:
zide888@qq.com 发表于 2017-5-17 13:32
比如能否举个例子 set block to 胡萝卜方块
怎么写qaq
这个……十分抱歉，是我想太多了……例子马上来！！
on rightclick on grass, dirt or soil with any hoe:
        set block to soil
        set block above to carrots
以上为成品，为什么要先set block to soil呢？因为作物下面如果没有泥土会自己掉出来……为什么要写set block above to carrots而不是set block to carrots呢？因为插件目录里有个例子-plant with hoe.sk，我是照抄里面的……
这个插件的文档和例子都很丰富，遇到问题可以考虑先看看例子里有没有能照抄的地方 0v0

replies.author: LRual
replies.txt_content:
首先小白表示不懂什么是skript= =

胡萝卜：  
minecraft:carrots
土豆：  
minecraft:potatoes复制代码

replies.author: 子德
replies.txt_content:
1026833619 发表于 2017-5-16 07:56
首先小白表示不懂什么是skript= =
噗 是方块。skript里面小麦植物方块是crops

http://minecraft.gamepedia.com/Plants#Blocks
我根据wiki上给的列表，用脚本生成了下面这个东西，注释掉的是无法使用的，因为甜菜是1.9的新作物，我的测试服务器是1.8.8，所以甜菜惨遭注释……
on rightclick on grass, dirt or soil with any hoe:
        set block above to grass
        set block above to dirt
        set block above to sapling
        set block above to log
        set block above to leaves
        # set block above to tallgrass
        # set block above to deadbush
        set block above to yellow_flower
        set block above to red_flower
        set block above to brown_mushroom
        set block above to red_mushroom
        set block above to wheat
        set block above to cactus
        # set block above to reeds
        set block above to pumpkin
        # set block above to brown_mushroom_block
        # set block above to red_mushroom_block
        set block above to melon_block
        set block above to pumpkin_stem
        
        set block above to melon_stem
        set block above to vine
        set block above to mycelium
        # set block above to waterlily
        set block above to nether_wart
        set block above to cocoa
        set block above to carrots
        set block above to potatoes
        # set block above to leaves2
        # set block above to log2
        
        # set block above to double_plant
        # set block above to beetroots
差不多就是原来作物的名字加上个s，南瓜西瓜是加上_stem

replies.author: xbxy
replies.txt_content:
物品拿在手中
send "%tool%"
send "%tool's name%"
send "%tool's lore%"
send "%tool's id%"
send "%tool's data%"

关于加分的问题，我想说，每天对每人看到有趣的内容加一次就好了，我们大多数都不缺这点积分 awa
